prompt:
A boldly seductive Korean woman in her 20s on a wooden veranda facing the sea at golden
hour, low-angle framing from knee to shoulders.
Pose: one knee raised, hips angled forward, torso subtly arched; one hand gripping the railing,
the other hand in hair at the back of her head (tension).
Expression: dominant direct gaze down toward camera, half-lidded eyes, soft parted lips, no
smile.
Outfit: fitted ribbed tank + high-waist lounge shorts, matte texture, visible knit detail.
Lighting: warm back/side light, smooth highlight roll-off, pale wood bounce, mild sun bloom.
Camera: 85mm f/1.8 handheld candid. Film: Portra 400, subtle grain.
Exclusions: no text/logos; realistic pores; no HDR, no over-sharpening.
